alert.note: Alert for Brown (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 1:40AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Elm River Near Frederick affecting Brown County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Elm River Near Frederick. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:30 AM CDT Sunday was 13.3 feet. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon by 200 PM CDT.
